title: New skins
body:
Hello guyz i have an idea. your can write here new skin ideas. :) so the forum is not polluted.

*My ideas on dark star theme
Dark star aatrox 
Dark star kindred
Dark star rengar 
Dark star veigar
Dark star zed
Dark star diana
Dark star kaisa
Dark star velkoz ( he need a good skin)
Dark star syndra (need skin)

*These are my original ideas
Tiger or Lion rengar (my fav)
God fist  vi
Holy fire brand (white theme)
İnfernal illaoi - aatrox
Spooky kayn(source nocturne:P)
Billiard ball rammus (black 8) :D
Mason taliyah 
Fire bird quinn
Fireball zac 
Galcier xayah
General graves
ungrateful cat Kled (he need skin)
ungrateful Cat rengar
Planet syndra (fire theme)
Astronaut ekko
Avalanche zac 

Thats all for now.. Thanks in advance for your comments and ideas. :)

replies.body: Can i ask why syndra needs the dark star (not that im against it, i think it would be cool) but she did just get her star gaurdian skin.
you know that this theme is very childish but there is no displeasure here the purpose is just to generate ideas :) i see 48384883 syndra main but all using justicar :)
Oh u are right pheni.. only thinking bro :)
yeah if they made a Holy Fire brand i would immediately buy it lulz. I agree w/ Velkoz dark star, but Xerath would be cooler for that line IMO. Maybe battle boss Velkoz?

> [{quoted}](name=Sergeant Wea,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=OXBYOIW2,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-06-04T02:43:22.671+0000)
>
> yeah if they made a Holy Fire brand i would immediately buy it lulz. I agree w/ Velkoz dark star, but Xerath would be cooler for that line IMO. Maybe battle boss Velkoz?

He have battle cast already:) xerath can be good idea my friend.
İ ve got this tiger rengar but u know new rammus and lee skins are comng so you must settle with ssw :)
Nice but riot dont look thats.. but really nice
İnteresting i see an rengar main:D not bad u can find moree good idea

>

Yea rengar is my main{{champion:107}}  i think but some champs really need it..

Outback Kled.
Bilgewater Urgot.
God Clock Zilean.
Battle Boss Viktor.
These are my desires.
Just imagine dark star vel koz with 4 black / dark dark purple stars for eyes

Dark Star Leona
Or literally any skin line that'll give her effects that aren't orange
